attributes.action: investigate widespread reliability problems with the Microsoft Xbox 360 Console, and results for those affected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many Xbox 360 owners have paid £280 for a console that soon fails with the dreaded "3 red lights".

Annoyingly, this often occurs after the 1 year warranty  forcing consumers to pay out another £87 for Microsoft to repair the console.

Microsoft state the failure rate is 3-5%. However, all indications point it to be higher than this. One website, with 1000s of participants have shown a failure rate of 66%.

There is clearly a reliabilty problem with the console and Microsoft have shown no effort to fix it. Action needs to  be taken. At the very least, refunds for repairs and free repairs for all console owners.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
